creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: row of buildings drawn in in linear perspective with an emphasis on the diagonal; square appears to float in UL corner
image_copyright: © Estate Lyonel Feininger %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Charcoal with pen and ink border
provenance: (John A. Torson, New York; sold to Andrus); John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; Elizabeth Haynes Andrus, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 2015.
signed: signed in black ink, lower left: [Feininger]; titled in black ink, lower center: [Strasse]l dated in black ink, lower right: [Sonntag d. 9. Mai 1915]
title: Street
